p: The conclusions drawn about the leaf extracts of this plant by the authors, especially in establishing a relationship between the phenolic content of the extracts and their potencies as antioxidant and antibacterial, were appropriate. However, I wished the authors could give consideration to seasonal variation in concentration statuses of polyphenolics and other bioactive compounds of the plant’s leaves. The month of June during which the study was carried out in the Eastern Cape, South Africa is the winter period, it would be revealing repeating the study in summer (between November and April) and drawing comparisons.
